alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 9:10PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WESTERN WAYNE COUNTY THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 909 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over New Castle, moving east at 20 mph. Strong winds out ahead of the storm will move in before the heavier rains. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cambridge City, Hagerstown, Dublin, Milton, Greens Fork, East Germantown, Mount Auburn and Jacksonburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
